"Three hundred." Samus said louder this time, with more confidence.

"Honestly wouldn't be surprised if you weren't even the real Samus-"

"THREE HUNDRED!" Samus yelled, finally stopping Jenny’s lacklustre detective skills.

"... Three hundred what?"

"Pounds. Of fat. On this body. That's how much I wish to gain. Now."

Jenny’s jaw dropped, sending her flabby chins into a jiggling frenzy.

"I... I was being facetious. What I'm really going to do is shoot you with this gun, vaporize the body and continue to fatten up loads of dumb custom-"

"Oh for the love of-“Sitting upright with an exasperated look on her face, Samus started to rant. “Look, 'Jenny', if that's even your real name, I’m dead serious.” Grabbing a large chunk of her gut and starting to violently shake it and knead it like a large blob of dough, the instructor found Samus’ behaviour all the more confusing. "Does this look like a fat-suit to you? You or the rest of you underworld types haven't questioned why I've been off the radar for so long? You're not wondering why I marched right up to what any idiot would know-" "A lot of sub-idiots come here!" Aggravated at the brick wall she was up against, an exhausted Samus held her chubby head in her hands. "Yes, the Federation did send me here."

"A-HAH! Well I hope you enjoyed your stay here, and I'm sorry that the mighty Samus was undone by a minimum-wage employee of an intentionally crappy gym-"

"BUT, I came here for other reasons!"

"Well of course! To claim the bounty I'm sure the Federation has on successfully bringing down our company for yourself instead of working solely under their jurisdiction, maybe using some of it for some rapid liposuction and-"

"NO, no no, more personal than that... To... Um..." Rolling her eyes, Samus continued. "... Become a fatso. The offer by the Federation to infiltrate this place was a once in a lifetime opportunity, and they almost didn't send me because of this." She gave her belly another playful jiggle. "If betraying them is what it takes then so be it; they're awaiting intel from me in a weeks time about this place due to a few cases of big-name people getting the fat treatment here. When I would inevitably come back confirming their suspicions, I had the all clear to blow this place to kingdom come. My 'gym bag' in the West Room still has a blaster in it, along with my zero-suit."

"... Still not convinced-"

Suddenly motioning Jenny to be quiet, the two listen as a ringing tone could be heard from Samus sweat pants. “Well great, that’s them now!”

“Well gee, that’s the fastest week I’ve ever experienced!”

"Whatever, just you watch just how loyal I am to the Federation, Jenny~!" Putting a surprisingly low-tech smartphone up to her ear, Samus answered with the speaker-function on.

"Hi, Megan here~!"

"... Megan? I'll take it that's your alias. Are you in a safe environment to take this call?"

"Yes, though I'm in the bathroom so you should probably keep this brief."

"Good. You've been there for three hours now; do you have any intel thus far? Normally we wouldn't check in this early in the mission but the commander's insisting, somewhat furiously I might add. Seems like whatever this place does to people... It's permanent." To this Jenny let a satisfied grunt of approval while Samus pumped her fist and silently mouthing YES. "We need your assessment NOW Samus; the commander's already stationed a few satellites well within ray-gun distance of the Nebula Gym, and all we need is even a bit of proof to-"

"There's nothing here."

"... What.”

"I've already covered this place basement to ceiling, used my tools to test out for any hidden rooms, bases, death machines or any other sort of insidious plot. From what I can amass so far it seems as if these victims share something more in common than just going to this gym; whoever the perpetrator is may merely be using this establishment as a red herring to their base of operations. I can investigate further, if the Federation decides against levelling an entire block because of a girl's weight issues-"

"Those weren't the only issues that spoilt brat had-"

"SSSSHHH!"

"Alright Samus, we get the idea, humor is not a strong point of yours and you're not exactly twiggy yourself. Your mission has been extended to a week, we can negotiate the reward if this comes up naught. Over and out."

Hanging up, Samus crossed her arms with a smug grin to an impressed Jenny, who slowly started to clap. "Well well, I'd have to say that the mighty Samus Aran spoken from galaxy to galaxy suddenly making it her life mission to become a fatso takes the cake as far as stories go! Not to mention her wanting to join Nebula Gym, the only gym where you'll come out twenty sizes larger than you came in or your money back!"

"And I still want to join, granted you stop... Eh, pointing that gun at me." Samus said as Jenny quickly shoved her blaster into her enormous cleavage and returned to her cheerful, peppy demeanour. "So, we still up for three hundred pounds via this ‘tube-exerciser’ here? In return for not saying a word about your insidious fattening plot and proceeding to drive more clueless idiots to your fine establishment~?" Breaking into a hearty belly laugh, Jenny started to slowly get up.

"Well Samus, here's the thing; out of everyone here, I'm just crazy about fat. I just love how large, heavy and powerful I feel with every slow step and move I take, that feeling of complete fullness after I clear out a buffet and just living life like nothing other than big old me matters. Samus groaned as she raised herself up, and began to rub her aching head. She was only in her Zero Suit, a bad sign, although better than being nude. She had come to this god forsaken rock of a planet because she had picked up a distress signal. When she had landed, she had instead been confronted by a large swarm of metroids. While watching some of them fuss over a cobbled together transmitter another metroid had hovered up to her. To her surprise it started speaking Common, albeit at a rate too fast for her to understand. All she had caught was the words "our queen" before something hit her hard enough to knock her out even with her Power Suit on.

Samus put her hand down next to her, and to her surprise it sank lower. Samus looked around and saw that she was on a large bed, inside a bedroom that was fit only for royalty, or special guests. A bright light was emanating from the door at the front of the room. The light grew brighter and brighter until it was nearly blinding. Then, with a thunderous roar, the door burst open. Through the glow Samus could just make out a humanoid figure. The figure had a body shape that was like Samus's, but more voluptuous. Then the light abruptly faded, and Samus saw that the woman's skin had the same color patterns and translucency as a metroid. Other than that, her small potbelly, and larger curves, the being was identical to Samus, all the way down to facial features. "Who are you, and why did you kidnap me?" asked Samus."

"I am Stellestria," the woman answered with a voice that rang with power and divinity, "creator, and goddess of the metroids."

Samus was now thoroughly afraid, for she had no reason to doubt the being's claim to divinity. After all, the metroids that had taken her were supposed to be extinct by her hand.

"As for why I brought you here, you have been the scourge of my creations for years, and I have devised a fitting solution," finished the goddess.

"So how are you going to kill me?" asked Samus.

"That thought had occurred to me," said Stellestria, "but I have a much better idea than merely killing you."

"Then what kind of horrible torture am I looking at?" asked Samus, now feeling very hopeless about her situation.

"What do you mean by that?" questioned Samus.

A metroid is created from a being's aura," Stellestria answered, "aura is replenished in two ways, which are consuming vast amounts of food, or absorbing power from nearby energy sources. As Samus looked upon the room before her, she couldn't believe her eyes. It was a massive banquet hall, with a single table in the middle, covered with all kinds of food. There were only two chairs, which were next to each other, both massive. The pair stepped into the room, and over to the chairs.

"Sit," Stellestria commanded, and Samus sat in one of the chairs, relaxing in its softness. Stellestria sat next to her, and reached for a plate with some kind of roasted meat on it. She broke off a chunk, and put it to the bounty hunter's mouth. Almost immediately, Samus tore into the meat, savoring its deliciousness with every bite. The goddess smiled, and broke off a piece for herself. Samus seemed so eager to eat whatever was put in front of her, this would only make Stellestria's job easier.

Over the course of what felt like an hour for Samus, she grabbed whatever bits of food Stellestria told her to take, and devoured them without hesitation. The goddess spent more time observing the bounty hunter than stuffing herself, but made sure to eat as much as she could.

Taking a break, Samus groaned and laid back in her chair. Her Zero Suit felt tighter than it had before, especially around her rear. Her once flat stomach appeared to now be a small, almost unnoticeable pouch. Stellestria took notice, and a grin came onto her face. The food was starting to fill her, and the best part was that the bounty hunter seemed to have no regret about what she was doing, instead enjoying it.

"I think I'm full, there's no way I can eat anymore food," Samus placed her hand on her stomach and whimpered, Stellestria's smile fading, "Then I guess I've have to feed you the rest myself." The goddess got out of her chair, took a handful of plates from the table, and stood in front of Samus.

"Open up," Stellestria ordered, and Samus opened her mouth. She felt so full, but that food looked too good to resist. The goddess put a plate to Samus's mouth, and tilted it up. The contents of the plate, some kind of steak and carrot-esque vegetables, slid down into her mouth. Before Samus had a chance to swallow, Stellestria had dropped the plate, and was tilting another into her mouth.

This process continued three more times, and when Samus was finally able to swallow her food, she did so with strain as the large helping made its way into her stomach. She had never been force-fed like this, but it certainly wouldn't be her last time.

After 15 minutes of repeated feeding, Samus had reached a point in which Stellestria was happy with. Her stomach had developed into a potbelly, its curves more apparent due to the Zero Suit. It was time to turn her from a bounty hunter, into a bounty mother.

"Up," Stellestria commanded, and Samus got out of her chair. The goddess took her hand, and led her back into the initial room, "get onto the bed," and once again, Samus complied. "Take off your suit," Samus did just that, leaving her in a black bra, and a pair of black panties.

Stellestria put the Zero Suit aside, and placed her translucent hand on Samus's stomach. The woman groaned as it started to glow a light green. As the glow faded, her stomach slowly turned the same translucent color as the goddess.

This translucency spread throughout her body, a similar pattern soon following. As her transformation ended, Samus heard a second heartbeat inside her. She placed her hand on her stomach, and gave it a gentle, motherly love. She could see the shape of the creature inside her; it was a Metroid.

Samus Aran, the bounty hunter who had executed so many Metroids, was now a Metroid Queen, destined to birth the creatures for the rest of her life. Stellestria had been successful, and she took great pride in that.
